doc:
Ray Romano https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray_Romano 0 Raymond Albert Romano (born December 21, 1957) is an American stand-up comedian, actor and screenwriter. He is best known for his role on the sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond, for which he received an Emmy Award, and as the voice of Manny in the Ice Age film series. He created and starred in the TNT comedy-drama Men of a Certain Age (2009–11). From 2012 to 2015, Romano had a recurring role as Hank Rizzoli, a love interest of Sarah Braverman in Parenthood, and co-starred in the romantic comedy The Big Sick (2017). Raymond_Albert_Romano ( born December_21_,_1957 ) is an_American_stand-up_comedian , actor_and_screenwriter . He is_best_known for his_role on the_sitcom_Everybody Loves Raymond , for which he received an_Emmy_Award , and as the_voice of Manny in the_Ice_Age_film_series . He created and starred in the_TNT_comedy-drama_Men of a_Certain_Age_(_2009 – 11_) . From 2012 to 2015 , Romano had a_recurring_role as Hank_Rizzoli , a_love_interest of Sarah_Braverman in Parenthood , and co-starred in the_romantic_comedy The_Big_Sick_(_2017_) .
